TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISoapServerVRoot

summary.span: 在服务器上发布经过身份验证的加密 SOAP 虚拟根目录。

span.span: Publishes authenticated, encrypted SOAP virtual roots on servers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅默认实现。See for the default implementation. 由.NET Framework 在内部使用。 is used internally by the .NET Framework. 不需要在代码中直接使用它。You do not need to use it directly in your code.

summary.span: 用安全选项创建一个 SOAP 虚拟根目录。

span.span: Creates a SOAP virtual root with security options.

exception.span: 调用链中的调用方无权访问非托管代码。

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
The SOAP utility is not available.

Deletes a virtual root.
Not fully implemented.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要删除虚拟根目录的功能不是当前在此接口的实现中提供的。The functionality to delete a virtual root is not currently available in the implementation of this interface. 实现返回而不会删除根。The implementation returns without deleting the root.

exception.span: 调用链中的调用方无权访问非托管代码。

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
The SOAP utility is not available.

exception.span: 标识系统目录的调用失败。

span.span: The call to identify the system directory failed.
